scripts.watch-s: pulp --watch run -o output/Server --src-path src/Server --include src/Shared/ --main Server.Main
scripts.w-landing: pulp --watch browserify -o output/Client/landing --src-path src/Client/Landing --main Client.Landing.Main --include src/Shared:src/Client/Common --to src/Client/javascript/landing.bundle.js --source-maps --standalone Landing
scripts.watch: npm run watch-s & npm run watch-c
